§ Vlog

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

The word “**vlog**” is short for both “**video-log**” and  “**video-blog**”.

A **video-blog** is a **web-blog** whose content includes or is only **video**.

A **video-log** content is only **video**.

The word “**vlog**” was coined by member(s) of the community that formed online on the [[videoblogging-mailing-list]].
